  "triples": [
    {"s":"Color Doppler", "p":"uses", "o":"RGB scheme", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"In color Doppler imaging, the motion is encoded using colors, typically the RGB scheme."},
    {"s":"Color Doppler", "p":"represents", "o":"velocity field", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"you can add the velocity field on top of it using color coding."},
    {"s":"Red", "p":"represents", "o":"towards transducer", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Motion toward the transducer is displayed in red"},
    {"s":"Blue", "p":"represents", "o":"away from transducer", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Motion away from the transducer is shown in blue"},
    {"s":"Green", "p":"represents", "o":"variance", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Sometimes a green component is used to indicate the variance of the signal"}

evidence: Sometimes a green component is used to indicate the variance of the signal
